detaileddescription.para: True when List1 and List2 are both lists and have the same number of elements No relation between the values of their elements is implied Modes same_length(-,+) and same_length(+,-) generate either list given the other; mode same_length(-,-) generates two lists of the same length, in which case the arguments will be bound to lists of length 0, 1, 2, ...

same_length(?List1, ?List2) is true when List1 and List2 are both lists and have the same number of elements No relation between the values of their elements is implied Modes same_length(-,+) and same_length(+,-) generate either list given the other; mode same_length(-,-) generates two lists of the same length, in which case the arguments will be bound to lists of length 0, 1, 2,
